name: Knight Runner (hiteshahuja)
description:
A Fallen Knight is on a quest to achieve redemption by acquiring the holy sword and defeating the final boss. You will have to defeat enemies in each level to collect the missing pieces of the sword. Once you have collected all missing pieces of the sword, you will advance to the final level of the game where you must defeat the final boss with your holy sword! The player will feel many different emotions while playing the game including excitement, mystery, and sadness. The player will have to think fast and think critically in certain situations, so that they can conserve their health and not lose health to enemies.

Game Link: https://hiteshahuja10.github.io/FinalGame/

Controls:

Use A&D to move & Space Bar to jump

Use S to decline (come down faster)

Press M to attack the enemies!

Press Space Bar to start the game!
